alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan, southeastern Jones, southern Shackelford and northern Taylor Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 800 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hamby, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Baird, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Moran, Putnam, Dudley, Caps, Dyess Afb, Atwell, Eula, Potosi, View, Hamby, Nugent and Coronados Camp. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 268 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
